main event: A sighting of a large round brilliant white object reported by pilots on 6 November 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3 minutes and occurred at 6:17 PM CST., The object changed appearance when passing behind clouds., Multiple observations were made by five individual commercial airline pilots., There was a balloon released at Joliet, Illinois around the time of the sighting., Ground radar reported a contact for ten seconds near the sighting area.
witness description: commercial airline pilots from TWA, CAL, CM Airlines, Northwest, and United
